replies.msg:
平心而論佢改車嘅分法基本上係反面教材
佢架NSX性能一定比原廠死氣差

1. Fuel pump/ Injectors 一定俾唔夠油
2. 空燃比極lean
3. 超多震爆令點火時間亂到九彩
4. 死氣溫度過高

如果架車有turbo 佢啲機油應該變咗奶昔

求解釋
死氣限制小左所以留係燃燒室既廢氣小左?
從而令到更多生氣入到燃燒室?搞到空燃比更lean?

但exhaust flow點影響intake AFR
把遮因為小左back pressure而早左upstroke所以吸氣果下downstroke快左吸多左生氣?

恕我唔明
因為用4stroke果張graph諗完全get唔到

replies.msg:
Imagine the cylinder with a piston that moves up and down within the cylinder. When the piston moves towards TDC (top dead center) it causes a positive pressure in the cylinder. As it moves away from TDC and closer to BDC (bottom dead center) it causes a vaccum in the cylinder.

As an oversimplification, the intake valve opens, the piston moves downward, and air is brought in. The valve closes, and the piston moves up compressing the air, which is ignited. The piston moves down because of ignition (producing power), and then moves back up as the exhaust valve opens.

As the exhaust gas is moved out of the cylinder, there's a vaccum caused by the rush of exhaust gas out of the cylinder . . . The intake valve is opened during this time and the vaccum actually draws MORE air than the effect of just the piston causing the vaccum.

A head will free up more area to allow the exhaust gas to move out of the cylinder faster, thus causing a larger vaccum to draw more intake air in the cylinder.

Hence, the lean run condition.

quote.msg:
Exhaust flow 多咗但 fuel supply catch up 唔到= lean condition

Lean AFR = 高EGT= 容易pre ignition

但exhaust flow點影響intake AFR
把遮因為小左back pressure而早左upstroke所以吸氣果下downstroke快左吸多左生氣?

恕我唔明
因為用4stroke果張graph諗完全get唔到

Imagine the cylinder with a piston that moves up and down within the cylinder. When the piston moves towards TDC (top dead center) it causes a positive pressure in the cylinder. As it moves away from TDC and closer to BDC (bottom dead center) it causes a vaccum in the cylinder.

As an oversimplification, the intake valve opens, the piston moves downward, and air is brought in. The valve closes, and the piston moves up compressing the air, which is ignited. The piston moves down because of ignition (producing power), and then moves back up as the exhaust valve opens.

As the exhaust gas is moved out of the cylinder, there's a vaccum caused by the rush of exhaust gas out of the cylinder . . . The intake valve is opened during this time and the vaccum actually draws MORE air than the effect of just the piston causing the vaccum.

A head will free up more area to allow the exhaust gas to move out of the cylinder faster, thus causing a larger vaccum to draw more intake air in the cylinder.

Hence, the lean run condition.

quote.msg:
Exhaust flow 多咗但 fuel supply catch up 唔到= lean condition

Lean AFR = 高EGT= 容易pre ignition

但exhaust flow點影響intake AFR
把遮因為小左back pressure而早左upstroke所以吸氣果下downstroke快左吸多左生氣?

恕我唔明
因為用4stroke果張graph諗完全get唔到

Imagine the cylinder with a piston that moves up and down within the cylinder. When the piston moves towards TDC (top dead center) it causes a positive pressure in the cylinder. As it moves away from TDC and closer to BDC (bottom dead center) it causes a vaccum in the cylinder.

As an oversimplification, the intake valve opens, the piston moves downward, and air is brought in. The valve closes, and the piston moves up compressing the air, which is ignited. The piston moves down because of ignition (producing power), and then moves back up as the exhaust valve opens.

As the exhaust gas is moved out of the cylinder, there's a vaccum caused by the rush of exhaust gas out of the cylinder . . . The intake valve is opened during this time and the vaccum actually draws MORE air than the effect of just the piston causing the vaccum.

A head will free up more area to allow the exhaust gas to move out of the cylinder faster, thus causing a larger vaccum to draw more intake air in the cylinder.

Hence, the lean run condition.

replies.msg:
90年代都行哂close loop啦
可以睇下short term trim 同long term trim (fuel)
NA車基本換下喉唔會改變到個氣缸空氣量
只不過係呼吸更加有效率
